00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00038 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00039 #include <lnet/lib-dlc.h>
00040 
00041 static int config_on_load = 0;
00042 module_param(config_on_load, int, 0444);
00043 MODULE_PARM_DESC(config_on_load, "configure network at module load");
00044 
00045 static struct mutex lnet_config_mutex;
00046 
00047 static int
00048 lnet_configure(void *arg)
00049 {
00050         /* 'arg' only there so I can be passed to cfs_create_thread() */
00051         int    rc = 0;
00052 
00053         mutex_lock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00054 
00055         if (!the_lnet.ln_niinit_self) {
00056                 rc = try_module_get(THIS_MODULE);
00057 
00058                 if (rc != 1)
00059                         goto out;
00060 
00061                 rc = LNetNIInit(LNET_PID_LUSTRE);
00062                 if (rc >= 0) {
00063                         the_lnet.ln_niinit_self = 1;
00064                         rc = 0;
00065                 } else {
00066                         module_put(THIS_MODULE);
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 
00070 out:
00071         mutex_unlock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00072         return rc;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static int
00076 lnet_unconfigure (void)
00077 {
00078         int   refcount;
00079 
00080         mutex_lock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00081 
00082         if (the_lnet.ln_niinit_self) {
00083                 the_lnet.ln_niinit_self = 0;
00084                 LNetNIFini();
00085                 module_put(THIS_MODULE);
00086         }
00087 
00088         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
00089         refcount = the_lnet.ln_refcount;
00090         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
00091 
00092         mutex_unlock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00093 
00094         return (refcount == 0) ? 0 : -EBUSY;
00095 }
00096 
00097 static int
00098 lnet_dyn_configure(struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr *hdr)
00099 {
00100         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *conf =
00101           (struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *)hdr;
00102         int                           rc;
00103 
00104         mutex_lock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00105         if (the_lnet.ln_niinit_self)
00106                 rc = lnet_dyn_add_ni(LNET_PID_LUSTRE, conf);
00107         else
00108                 rc = -EINVAL;
00109         mutex_unlock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00110         return rc;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static int
00114 lnet_dyn_unconfigure(struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr *hdr)
00115 {
00116         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *conf =
00117           (struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *) hdr;
00118         int                           rc;
00119 
00120         mutex_lock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00121         if (the_lnet.ln_niinit_self)
00122                 rc = lnet_dyn_del_ni(conf->cfg_net);
00123         else
00124                 rc = -EINVAL;
00125         mutex_unlock(&lnet_config_mutex);
00126 
00127         return rc;
00128 }
00129 
00130 static int
00131 lnet_ioctl(unsigned int cmd, struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr *hdr)
00132 {
00133         int   rc;
00134 
00135         switch (cmd) {
00136         case IOC_LIBCFS_CONFIGURE: {
00137                 struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data =
00138                   (struct libcfs_ioctl_data *)hdr;
00139                 the_lnet.ln_nis_from_mod_params = data->ioc_flags;
00140                 return lnet_configure(NULL);
00141         }
00142 
00143         case IOC_LIBCFS_UNCONFIGURE:
00144                 return lnet_unconfigure();
00145 
00146         case IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_NET:
00147                 return lnet_dyn_configure(hdr);
00148 
00149         case IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_NET:
00150                 return lnet_dyn_unconfigure(hdr);
00151 
00152         default:
00153                 /* Passing LNET_PID_ANY only gives me a ref if the net is up
00154                  * already; I'll need it to ensure the net can't go down while
00155                  * I'm called into it */
00156                 rc = LNetNIInit(LNET_PID_ANY);
00157                 if (rc >= 0) {
00158                         rc = LNetCtl(cmd, hdr);
00159                         LNetNIFini();
00160                 }
00161                 return rc;
00162         }
00163 }
00164 
00165 DECLARE_IOCTL_HANDLER(lnet_ioctl_handler, lnet_ioctl);
00166 
00167 static int __init lnet_init(void)
00168 {
00169         int rc;
00170         ENTRY;
00171 
00172         mutex_init(&lnet_config_mutex);
00173 
00174         rc = lnet_lib_init();
00175         if (rc != 0) {
00176                 CERROR("lnet_lib_init: error %d\n", rc);
00177                 RETURN(rc);
00178         }
00179 
00180         rc = libcfs_register_ioctl(&lnet_ioctl_handler);
00181         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00182 
00183         if (config_on_load) {
00184                 /* Have to schedule a separate thread to avoid deadlocking
00185                  * in modload */
00186                 (void)kthread_run(lnet_configure, NULL, "lnet_initd");
00187         }
00188 
00189         RETURN(0);
00190 }
00191 
00192 static void __exit lnet_exit(void)
00193 {
00194         int rc;
00195 
00196         rc = libcfs_deregister_ioctl(&lnet_ioctl_handler);
00197         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00198 
00199         lnet_lib_exit();
00200 }
00201 
00202 MODULE_AUTHOR("OpenSFS, Inc. <http://www.lustre.org/>");
00203 MODULE_DESCRIPTION("Lustre Networking layer");
00204 MODULE_VERSION(LNET_VERSION);
00205 MODULE_LICENSE("GPL");
00206 
00207 module_init(lnet_init);
00208 module_exit(lnet_exit);
